alert.note: Alert for Southern Gila Foothills, Mimbres Valley; Southern Gila Highlands, Black Range (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 16 at 10:27AM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Grant and southwestern Sierra Counties through 1100 AM MDT... At 1027 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mimbres, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Lorenzo, Mimbres, Fierro, Camp Thunderbird, Cooney, Georgetown, Upper Mimbres Valley, Bear Canyon Lake, Portions of the Aldo Leopold Wilderness and Iron Creek Campground. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Southern Gila Foothills, Mimbres Valley; Southern Gila Highlands, Black Range
